subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Skiing
lead_paragraph: For the first time, five American men finished among the top 10 in World Cup in Val Gardena, Italy and all seven American starters finished in the top 30 to claim coveted World Cup points.
snippet: For the first time, five American men finished among the top 10 in World Cup in Val Gardena, Italy and all seven American starters finished in the top 30 to claim coveted World Cup points.
